name: Lego Turret Parkour
description:
Title: Lego Turret Parkour
Platform: PC Game
Genre: Platformer
Rating: E
Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers
Game Overview:
The game is a parkour course through the floating islands. As you attempt to escape through the floating islands, you shall be shot at by turrets/enemies. The goal of the game is to survive the turrets and reach the end of the parkour course. Also, watch out for hazard platforms!
Instructions:
Use your mouse to control the camera and your WASD keys to move. The goal is to reach the end of the parkour course.
Game Design Team:MacGregor Bracken
